thread.title: Telangana: Intermediate public exam on March 9 postponed
thread.title_full: Telangana: Intermediate public exam on March 9 postponed

author: DECCAN CHRONICLE.
title: Telangana: Intermediate public exam on March 9 postponed
text:
The Board instructed principals to create awareness about the change of exam date. (Representational image) HYDERABAD: The Intermediate public examination scheduled on March 9 has been postponed to March 19 (Sunday). The postponement was necessitated the teacher MLC election in Ranga Reddy, Mahbubnagar and Hyderabad districts.
The Intermediate Board stated that the Mathematics Paper-IIB, Zoology Paper-II, History Paper-II and 2nd year vocational paper-II slated for March 9 would now be held on March 19.
The exam will be conducted in the same centres from 9 am to 12 noon. The Board instructed principals to create awareness about the change of exam date.
